def is_palindrome(x):
    y = str(x)
    if y == y[::-1]:
        return True
    else:
        return False


max_n = 1003002
a = [0] * (max_n + 1)
a[1] = 1
for x in range(2, max_n + 1):
    if a[x] == 0:
        for y in range(x * x, max_n + 1, x):
            a[y] = 1
for x in range(max_n - 1, 1, -1):
    if a[x] == 0 and is_palindrome(x):
        a[x] = x
    else:
        a[x] = a[x + 1]
n = int(raw_input())
print a[n]
